title: Constant bugsplat in game
body:
[](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/228265187436658688/386985160417083402/image.jpg)

Game randomly bugsplats over and over during games and lets me reconnect instantly.

replies.body: Usually those bugsplats are a good sign that some game files are running into problems somewhere, but the client doesn't know how to handle the crash that happened. Check out the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some basic troubleshooting and maybe try running a repair afterwards, but definitely hit me back up if nothings helping.
I have repaired the client multiple times. I have completely uninstalled the client and reinstalled it. I have reformatted windows I have completely cleaned out and restored my computer as well

Those can be some good troubleshooting steps, but also be sure to let me know once you've gone through the steps in the guide I linked as well. Those cover most of the usual causes of bugsplats so we need to be sure to do those as well.

I ran through everything on that list about two days ago already posted that on here. Ive also reset my disk usage and cleaned out a lot of crap and it's still happening. not sure else what to do besides get a new computer.

No worries if those steps aren't helping, reach out to the techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can look through some of your logs to see what might be going wrong.

Not sure what else to do? could this be a hardware issue? You guys should really update your client to figure out what is causing it to crash. I have games that are in ALPHA that are capable of doing this. I'm sure you could hold off on putting out some awful skins and make your client a little better for the people playing the game.
does this company have any tech support whatsoever?

Have done everything on that list and it is still bugsplatting. would be useful if you guys could maybe fix your client to tell me WAHT is happening when I bug splat so I could fix it. can't play this game like this
